name: SANTA by Virtuals
description: Agentic on-chain NGO for public goods,Standardization: Modularizes diverse APIs into easily deployable plugins, connecting agents to Web2 services like Gmail and Telegram and Web3 protocols like DeFi trading and blockchain explorers. Dynamic Learning: Teaches agents to adapt to new services via example-driven configurations, minimizing hardcoding. Optimized Interactions: Enhances reliability and scalability by fine-tuning APIs for seamless agent use.
